DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Multiple Doses BIRT 2584 XX Tablets Pharmacokinetic Parameters Midazolam Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject determine result screen Signed write informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation Age ≥ 18 ≤ 55 year BMI ≥ 18.5 ≤ 29.9 kg/m2 Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate , electrocardiogram ) deviate normal clinical relevance Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunologic , hematological , oncological , hormonal disorder Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder neurological disorder Relevant history orthostatic hypotension , faint spell , blackout Chronic relevant acute infection History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) consider relevant trial judge investigator Intake drug long halflife ( great 24 hour ) ( less 1 month prior administration trial ) Use drug , might influence result trial ( le 10 day prior study drug administration expect trial ) Participation another trial investigational drug ( le 2 month prior administration expect trial ) Smoker ( 10 cigarettes/day 3 cigars/day 3 pipes/day ) Alcohol abuse ( 60 g ethanol per day ) Drug abuse Blood donation loss great 400 mL ( less 1 month prior administration expect trial ) Clinically relevant laboratory abnormality
